<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Sorcerer Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=6226) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 181 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Sorcerer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=234)

**Prerequisites**
[Sorcerer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6225)

</column>

---

You gain the basic spellcasting benefits. Each time you gain a spell slot of a new rank from the sorcerer archetype, add a spell of the appropriate spell rank to your repertoire: a common spell of your bloodline’s tradition, one of your bloodline’s granted spells, or another spell you have learned or discovered.

<title level="2">Basic Sorcerer Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Bloodline Breadth](/Feats.aspx?ID=6230), [Expert Sorcerer Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=6231)
name: Basic Sorcerer Spellcasting
